about_the_game:
In this game about a gas station, you are the boss. From Zero to Hero, you are responsible here for either the economic success or downfall.

You start - as it should be - with almost nothing. If you handle it skillfully, you’ll end up with a fully developed gas station, complete with your own employees and plenty to keep you busy.

The following areas await you:
- Fuel Pumps: Refuel the approaching cars and collect payments. Additionally, expand the refueling options by earning more fuel pumps.

- Car Wash: Plenty of dirty cars! Once you’ve created at least one car wash facility, you can serve your customers and clean their vehicles. Later on, you can even add a self-service option!

- Car Repair: Fix vehicles in your own workshop, at least until you have staff for this task.

- Gas Station Shop: Collect payments from customers who have refueled, order goods, stock shelves, and sell them profitably! Of course, this comes after you’ve equipped your shop with a few shelves.

- Refinery: This is where you get the raw material… but will you also get the best conditions?1
